commentBody: Age has its benefits. I was 16 years old in 1964 when I went to the first football game played at Shea with the new Jets (former Titans). I saw Joe Namath live a few times. And before I was in the service in 1969, I saw the Jets win the Super Bowl. I've now seen stadiums go up, and stadiums come down. I've seen teams go up, and then down. But the Jets are sui generis; I blame management and coaching for the continuing debacle of more than 45 years, not bad luck. And although I'm a "fan," to the younger generation my advice is not be be a "fanatic."
